content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. How can I help you today? Are you looking for help with electrical, plumbing, or HVAC services?
Yes, I need an electrician. The lights keep flickering throughout the house and nothing ever gets fixed right the first time. Are you actually going to send someone who knows what they're doing?
I'm sorry to hear about the trouble with your lights! We only work with licensed and experienced electricians. To get started, could I have your name, please?
It's Linda. I just want someone to get it done right this time. And I’m not paying a fortune for something basic.
Thank you, Linda. I understand how frustrating this must be. May I have your address to confirm we serve your area and so I can help you schedule an appointment?
3248 Mallory Drive. But the last company said they'd come and didn’t even show up. If your people are just going to charge me to look around and leave, forget it.
I appreciate your concerns, Linda. We strive for punctuality and transparency. Would you like a price estimate before scheduling, or should I check the soonest available appointment for you?
Of course I want a price! But there better not be surprise fees or upsells like other places. How much is it to just fix some flickering lights? And don't say you have to come look first.
I can provide a general estimate for fixing flickering lights, but exact pricing depends on the cause. Would you like a ballpark estimate, or do you want to discuss with a human specialist?
Whatever, just tell me the ballpark. And I want to know EXACTLY when they'd come if I did book. I can’t wait around all day.

Typically, fixing flickering lights costs between $120 and $250, depending on the severity and the wiring involved. There are no surprise fees—you would be informed before any extra work. What day and time work best for you?
That’s still a lot. I work from home so I can’t have interruptions. Do your electricians even know what they’re doing or am I going to be calling again a week later?

Our electricians are fully licensed, background-checked, and experienced. We guarantee our work—if it isn't fixed right, we'll come back. If you’d like, I can book you the first appointment of the day to minimize any disruption. Would you like to proceed?
I don’t know. I just have bad luck with these things. I’ll think about it.
reason: Customer not ready to schedule; expresses ongoing dissatisfaction
